text: Blind Date, also known as Deadly Seduction, is a 1984 American British Greek erotic thriller movie directed by Nico Mastorakis and starring Kirstie Alley, Joseph Bottoms, Marina Sirtis, Lana Clarkson. It was distributed by New Line Cinema. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1980s erotic movies Category:1984 thriller movies Category:Greek movies Category:Liechtenstein movies Category:American thriller movies Category:British thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Nico Mastorakis
title: Blind Date (1984 movie)
